title: Bei Wa Xue Zhongwen Hai Xiao Dongwu
title_japanese: 贝瓦学中文 嗨 小动物
synopsis: "Bewa Learn Chinese: Hi, Little Animals" is a children's cognitive animation designed and produced for babies between 0 and 3 years old. Through simple and interesting scenes, exaggerated and vivid character animations, the interaction between the narration and the protagonist little beaver is used to guide the baby to recognize things. This season, the little beaver will have a series of interesting stories with the little animals: he helped the sloth cross the road, the banana was stolen by the naughty little monkey, the elephant used his nose to help the little beaver bath... Come and join the little beaver Learn about the appearance of various small animals! (translated form iqiyi)
